conversation.text:
If you're looking for something more about the history of warfare, then "Flyboys" (2006) might be a good choice. It follows the adventures of young Americans who volunteered for the French military during World War I. 

If you're interested in an action-packed film with some political intrigue, then "A Bridge Too Far" (1977) might be the film for you. The story follows a group of Allied soldiers in the Netherlands during World War II, who attempt to capture several important bridges.

If you're looking for a thought-provoking film about a man's struggle with addiction and his pursuit of insanity, then "Downfall" (2004) might be a good choice. The film follows a man who is thrust back into the life he thought he'd abandoned forever, but his drug-influenced past could prove to be a dangerous danger.
